Birmingham City won. Again. For the fourth time in seven games John Eustaces side prevailed, and this time at a ground where they hadnt won since 2009.
 A first half penalty from Troy Deeney and sec… [+7027 chars]

articles.title: T20 World Cup: Scotland shock West Indies in Group B - BBC
articles.description: Scotland, ranked 15th in the world, start their T20 World Cup campaign in brilliant fashion with a shock victory over West Indies.
articles.content:
